mapper.insert: insert into coupon(cp_code, cp_name, cp_content, cp_amount, cp_sale, cp_start_date, cp_end_date) values(#{cp_code}, #{cp_name}, #{cp_content}, #{cp_amount}, #{cp_sale}, #{cp_start_date}, #{cp_end_date})
mapper.update: update coupon set cp_amount = cp_amount - 1 where cp_code = #{cp_code}
mapper.select: select cp_code, cp_amount from page200.coupon where cp_code = #{cp_code}
